label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"鸡球虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":58,"end":62,"text":"寄生虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":75,"end":84,"text":"急性流行性寄生虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":47,"end":48,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 鸡球虫病（Avian coccidiosis，Coccidiosis in Chicken）是鸡常见且危害十分严重的寄生虫病，是由一种或多种球虫引起的急性流行性寄生虫病。它造成的经济损失是惊人的。

label: [{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":19,"end":22,"text":"青年鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 10～30日龄的雏鸡或35～60日龄的青年鸡的发病率和致死率可高达80%。

label: [{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"生长受阻","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"增重缓慢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":30,"end":39,"text":"增重和产蛋能力降低","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":43,"end":46,"text":"球虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":15,"end":18,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":52,"end":58,"text":"其他类传染病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":59,"end":63,"text":"寄生虫病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 病愈的雏鸡生长受阻，增重缓慢；成年鸡一般不发病，但为带虫者，增重和产蛋能力降低，是传播球虫病的重要病源。其他类传染病、寄生虫病。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":47,"end":49,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":63,"end":70,"text":"柔嫩艾美耳球虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"精神沉郁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"羽毛蓬松","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"头卷缩","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"食欲减退","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":28,"text":"嗉囊内充满液体","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":29,"end":38,"text":"鸡冠和可视粘膜贫血","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":13,"text":"头","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"嗉囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"鸡冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"可视粘膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"蓬松","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"卷缩","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"贫血","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"苍白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":42,"end":46,"text":"逐渐消瘦","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":49,"end":59,"text":"常排红色葫萝卜样粪便","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":57,"end":59,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":51,"end":53,"text":"红色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":71,"end":80,"text":"开始时粪便为咖啡色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":82,"end":90,"text":"后变为完全的血粪","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":77,"end":80,"text":"咖啡色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":74,"end":76,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病鸡精神沉郁，羽毛蓬松，头卷缩，食欲减退，嗉囊内充满液体，鸡冠和可视粘膜贫血、苍白，逐渐消瘦，病鸡常排红色葫萝卜样粪便，若感染柔嫩艾美耳球虫，开始时粪便为咖啡色，以后变为完全的血粪，如不及时采取措施，致死率可达50%以上。

label: [{"start":1,"end":9,"text":"多种球虫混合感染","labels":["disease"]},{"start":10,"end":16,"text":"粪便中带血液","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":18,"end":28,"text":"含有大量脱落的肠粘膜","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":25,"end":28,"text":"肠粘膜","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 若多种球虫混合感染，粪便中带血液，并含有大量脱落的肠粘膜。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"急性球虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"精神","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"食欲不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"饮欲增加","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"被毛粗乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"腹泻","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":27,"end":32,"text":"粪便常带血","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"贫血","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":44,"end":48,"text":"肉垂苍白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"苍白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"粗乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"被毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":25,"text":"腹","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":36,"end":40,"text":"可视粘膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":41,"end":43,"text":"鸡冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"肉垂","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":49,"end":51,"text":"脱水","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":52,"end":56,"text":"皮肤皱缩","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":54,"end":56,"text":"皱缩","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":57,"end":63,"text":"生产性能下降","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":64,"end":72,"text":"严重的可引起死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":92,"end":99,"text":"恢复者生长缓慢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":52,"end":54,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 急性球虫病：精神、食欲不振，饮欲增加；被毛粗乱；腹泻，粪便常带血；贫血，可视粘膜、鸡冠、肉垂苍白；脱水，皮肤皱缩；生产性能下降；严重的可引起死亡，死亡率可达80%，一般为20-30%。恢复者生长缓慢。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"慢性球虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":14,"text":"少量球虫感染","labels":["disease"]},{"start":17,"end":27,"text":"致病力不强的球虫感染","labels":["disease"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"堆型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":32,"end":39,"text":"巨型艾美耳球虫","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 慢性球虫病：见于少量球虫感染，以及致病力不强的球虫感染（如堆型、巨型艾美耳球虫）。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"拉稀","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":4,"end":8,"text":"多不带血","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":15,"text":"生产性能下降","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":16,"end":26,"text":"对其它疾病易感性增强","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 拉稀，但多不带血。生产性能下降，对其它疾病易感性增强。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"消瘦","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":5,"end":12,"text":"鸡冠与粘膜苍白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"苍白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"内脏变化","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"肠管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"鸡冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"粘膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"内脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病鸡消瘦，鸡冠与粘膜苍白，内脏变化主要发生在肠管，病变部位和程度与球虫的种别有关。

label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"柔嫩艾美耳球虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"侵害盲肠","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":14,"end":22,"text":"两支盲肠显著肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":50,"text":"肠腔中充满凝固的或新鲜的暗红色血液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":48,"text":"暗红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":57,"text":"盲肠上皮变厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":59,"end":64,"text":"严重的糜烂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"盲肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"盲肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"肠腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":51,"end":55,"text":"盲肠上皮","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 柔嫩艾美耳球虫主要侵害盲肠，两支盲肠显著肿大，可为正常的3～5倍，肠腔中充满凝固的或新鲜的暗红色血液，盲肠上皮变厚，有严重的糜烂。

label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"毒害艾美耳球虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"小肠中段","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"肠壁","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"扩张","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":29,"text":"严重的坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":49,"text":"明显的淡白色斑点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":47,"text":"淡白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":50,"end":60,"text":"粘膜上有许多小出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":34,"text":"裂殖体","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"粘膜","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 毒害艾美耳球虫损害小肠中段，使肠壁扩张、增厚，有严重的坏死。在裂殖体繁殖的部位，有明显的淡白色斑点，粘膜上有许多小出血点。

label: [{"start":10,"end":22,"text":"有葫萝卜色胶冻状的内容物","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"葫萝卜色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":0,"end":9,"text":"肠管中有凝固的血液","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"肠管","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肠管中有凝固的血液或有葫萝卜色胶冻状的内容物。

label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"巨型艾美耳球虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":7,"end":13,"text":"损害小肠中段","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"小肠中段","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"肠管扩张","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"扩张","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"肠壁增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":31,"text":"内容物粘稠","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":36,"text":"淡灰色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":40,"text":"淡褐色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":44,"text":"淡红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"肠管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"肠壁","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 巨型艾美耳球虫损害小肠中段，可使肠管扩张，肠壁增厚；内容物粘稠，呈淡灰色、淡褐色或淡红色。

label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"堆型艾美耳球虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"上皮表层","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":33,"text":"同一发育阶段的虫体常聚集在一起","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":50,"text":"被损害的肠段出现大量淡白色斑点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":48,"text":"淡白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"肠段","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 堆型艾美耳球虫多在上皮表层发育，并且同一发育阶段的虫体常聚集在一起，在被损害的肠段出现大量淡白色斑点。

label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"哈氏艾美耳球虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"肠壁","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":29,"text":"大头针头大小的出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"粘膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":33,"end":38,"text":"严重的出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":13,"text":"损害小肠前段","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"小肠前段","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 哈氏艾美耳球虫损害小肠前段，肠壁上出现大头针头大小的出血点，粘膜有严重的出血。

label: [{"start":1,"end":9,"text":"多种球虫混合感染","labels":["disease"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"肠管粗大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"粗大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":27,"text":"肠粘膜上有大量的出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":27,"text":"出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":51,"text":"肠管中有大量的带有脱落的肠上皮细胞的紫黑色血液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":49,"text":"紫黑色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"肠管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":16,"end":19,"text":"肠粘膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"肠管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":40,"end":45,"text":"肠上皮细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":49,"end":51,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 若多种球虫混合感染，则肠管粗大，肠粘膜上有大量的出血点，肠管中有大量的带有脱落的肠上皮细胞的紫黑色血液。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"加强饲养管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":7,"end":16,"text":"成鸡与雏鸡分开喂养","labels":["control"]},{"start":39,"end":45,"text":"保持鸡舍干燥","labels":["control"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"通风","labels":["control"]},{"start":49,"end":53,"text":"鸡场卫生","labels":["control"]},{"start":54,"end":60,"text":"定期清除粪便","labels":["control"]},{"start":61,"end":63,"text":"堆放","labels":["control"]},{"start":64,"end":71,"text":"发酵以杀灭卵囊","labels":["control"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"成鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":22,"end":25,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":35,"end":38,"text":"球虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":58,"end":60,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 加强饲养管理：成鸡与雏鸡分开喂养，以免带虫的成年鸡散播病原导致雏鸡爆发球虫病。保持鸡舍干燥、通风和鸡场卫生，定期清除粪便，堆放；发酵以杀灭卵囊。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"保持饲料","labels":["control"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"饮水清洁","labels":["control"]},{"start":16,"end":22,"text":"水槽定期消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":31,"end":34,"text":"用沸水","labels":["control"]},{"start":35,"end":38,"text":"热蒸气","labels":["control"]},{"start":44,"end":50,"text":"热碱水等处理","labels":["control"]}]
text: 保持饲料、饮水清洁，笼具、料槽、水槽定期消毒，一般每周一次，可用沸水、热蒸气或3%～5%热碱水等处理。

label: [{"start":5,"end":8,"text":"球杀灵","labels":["drug"]},{"start":15,"end":27,"text":"农乐溶液消毒鸡场及运动场","labels":["control"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"球虫卵囊","labels":["disease"]},{"start":60,"end":61,"text":"硒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":64,"end":65,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"农乐溶液","labels":["drug"]},{"start":73,"end":82,"text":"补充足够的维生素K","labels":["control"]},{"start":78,"end":82,"text":"维生素K","labels":["drug"]},{"start":93,"end":97,"text":"维生素A","labels":["drug"]},{"start":100,"end":101,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":102,"end":105,"text":"球虫病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 据报道：用球杀灵和1：200的农乐溶液消毒鸡场及运动场，均对球虫卵囊有强大杀灭作用。每千克日粮中添加0.25～0.5mg硒可增强鸡对球虫的抵抗力。补充足够的维生素K和给予3～7倍推荐量的维生素A可加速鸡患球虫病后的康复。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"免疫预防","labels":["control"]},{"start":9,"end":36,"text":"应用鸡胚传代致弱的虫株或早熟选育的致弱虫株给鸡免疫接种","labels":["control"]},{"start":31,"end":32,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":39,"end":40,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":41,"end":44,"text":"球虫病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 免疫预防：据报道，应用鸡胚传代致弱的虫株或早熟选育的致弱虫株给鸡免疫接种,可使鸡对球虫病产生较好的预防效果。

label: [{"start":5,"end":10,"text":"强毒株球虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":12,"end":24,"text":"少量多次感染的涓滴免疫法","labels":["control"]},{"start":25,"end":26,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":31,"end":32,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":48,"end":52,"text":"强毒球虫","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 亦有人利用强毒株球虫采用少量多次感染的涓滴免疫法给鸡接种，可使鸡获得坚强的免疫力，但此法使用的是强毒球虫，易造成病原散播，生产中应慎用。

label: [{"start":4,"end":8,"text":"球虫疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"疫苗","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 此外有关球虫疫苗的保存、运输、免疫时机、免疫剂量及免疫保护性和疫苗安全性等诸多问题，均有待进一步研究。

label: [{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"鸡球虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"药物防治","labels":["control"]}]
text: 药物防治：迄今为止，国内外对鸡球虫病的防制主要是依靠药物。

label: [{"start":6,"end":11,"text":"化学合成的","labels":["drug"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"抗生素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":29,"end":35,"text":"专用抗球虫药","labels":["drug"]},{"start":42,"end":46,"text":"抗球虫药","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 使用的药物有化学合成的和抗生素两大类，从1936年首次出现专用抗球虫药以来，已报道的抗球虫药达40余种，现今广泛使用的有20种。

label: [{"start":7,"end":10,"text":"氯苯胍","labels":["drug"]},{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"常用预防药物","labels":["control"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"混饲","labels":["control"]}]
text: 常用预防药物：氯苯胍：预防按30～33mg/kg浓度混饲，连用1～2个月，治疗按60～66mg/kg混饲3～7d，后改预防量预以控制。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"氨丙啉","labels":["drug"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"混饲","labels":["control"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"饮水给药","labels":["control"]}]
text: 氨丙啉：可混饲或饮水给药。混饲预防浓度为100～125mg/kg，连用2～4周；治疗浓度为250mg/kg，连用1～2周，然后减半，连用2～4周。

label: [{"start":16,"end":21,"text":"维生素B1","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 应用本药期间，应控制每千克饲料中维生素B1的含量以不超过10mg为宜，以免降低药效。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"硝苯酰胺","labels":["drug"]},{"start":5,"end":8,"text":"球痢灵","labels":["drug"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"混饲预防","labels":["control"]}]
text: 硝苯酰胺（球痢灵）：混饲预防浓度为125mg/kg,治疗浓度为250～300mg/kg，连用3～5d。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"莫能霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"混饲连用","labels":["control"]}]
text: 莫能霉素：预防按80～125mg/kg浓度混饲连用。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"盐霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":4,"end":7,"text":"球虫粉","labels":["drug"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"优素精","labels":["drug"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"混饲连用","labels":["control"]}]
text: 盐霉素（球虫粉，优素精）：预防按60～70mg/kg浓度混饲连用。

label: [{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"混饲连用","labels":["control"]},{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"地克珠利","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 地克珠利：预防按1PPM浓度混饲连用。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"马杜拉霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":6,"end":9,"text":"抗球王","labels":["drug"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"杜球","labels":["drug"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"加福","labels":["drug"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"混饲连用","labels":["control"]}]
text: 马杜拉霉素（抗球王、杜球、加福）：预防按5～6mg/kg浓度混饲连用。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"尼卡巴嗪","labels":["drug"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"混饲预防","labels":["control"]}]
text: 尼卡巴嗪：混饲预防浓度为100～125mg/kg，育雏期可连续给药。

label: [{"start":7,"end":13,"text":"妥曲珠利溶液","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 常用治疗药物：妥曲珠利溶液（奎文家禽研究所）：治疗用药，500kg体重/瓶饮水；1次/日，连用2-3日。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"磺胺类药","labels":["drug"]},{"start":25,"end":28,"text":"球虫病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 磺胺类药：对治疗已发生感染的优于其他药物，故常用于球虫病的治疗。

label: [{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"磺胺药","labels":["drug"]},{"start":21,"end":24,"text":"磺胺药","labels":["drug"]},{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"商品肉鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"复方磺胺","labels":["drug"]},{"start":33,"end":37,"text":"甲氧嘧啶","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 常用的磺胺药有（注意：出口商品肉鸡禁止使用磺胺药）：复方磺胺-5-甲氧嘧啶（SMD-TMP），按0.03%拌料，连用5～7d。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"磺胺喹恶啉","labels":["drug"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"混饲","labels":["control"]},{"start":65,"end":67,"text":"混饲","labels":["control"]},{"start":98,"end":105,"text":"16周龄以上鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":109,"end":112,"text":"氨丙啉","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 磺胺喹恶啉（SQ），预防按150～250mg/kg浓度混饲或按50～100mg/kg浓度饮水，治疗按500～1000mg/kg浓度混饲或250～500mg/kg饮水，连用3d，停药2d，再用3d。16周龄以上鸡限用。与氨丙啉合用有增效作用。

label: [{"start":0,"end":8,"text":"磺胺间二甲氧嘧啶","labels":["drug"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"混饲","labels":["control"]},{"start":34,"end":41,"text":"16周龄以下鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":66,"end":68,"text":"混饲","labels":["control"]}]
text: 磺胺间二甲氧嘧啶（SDM），预防按125～250mg/kg浓度混饲，16周龄以下鸡可连续使用；治疗按1000～2000mg/kg浓度混饲或按500～600mg/kg饮水，连用5～6d，或连用3d，停药2d，再用3d。

label: [{"start":0,"end":8,"text":"磺胺间六甲氧嘧啶","labels":["drug"]},{"start":19,"end":22,"text":"制菌磺","labels":["drug"]},{"start":24,"end":28,"text":"混饲预防","labels":["control"]},{"start":62,"end":64,"text":"混饲","labels":["control"]},{"start":89,"end":93,"text":"乙胺嘧啶","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 磺胺间六甲氧嘧啶（SMM，DS—36，制菌磺），混饲预防浓度为100～200mg/kg；治疗按100～2000mg/kg浓度混饲或600～1200mg/kg饮水，连用4～7d。与乙胺嘧啶合用有增效作用。

label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"磺胺二甲基嘧啶","labels":["drug"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"混饲","labels":["control"]},{"start":68,"end":70,"text":"混饲","labels":["control"]},{"start":105,"end":112,"text":"16周龄以上鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 磺胺二甲基嘧啶（SM2），预防按2500mg/kg浓度混饲或按500～1000mg/kg浓度饮水，治疗以4000～5000mg/kg浓度混饲或1000～2000mg/kg浓度饮水，连用3d，停药2d，再用3d。16周龄以上鸡限用。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"磺胺氯吡嗪","labels":["drug"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"混饲","labels":["control"]}]
text: 磺胺氯吡嗪（Esb3），以600～1000mg/kg浓度混饲或300～400mg/kg浓度饮水，连用3d。
